verse.content: Yesu Kristo adiyie a Onyankopɔn de maa no sɛ ɔnkyerɛ ne nkoa deɛ ɛtwa sɛ ɛba ntɛm, na ɔnam ne bɔfoɔ so de bɛkyerɛɛ n’akoa Yohane
a wadi Nyankopɔn asɛm ne Yesu Kristo adanseɛ ne deɛ ɔhunuiɛ nyinaa ho adanseɛ.
Nhyira ne deɛ ɔkenkan ne wɔn a wɔtie adiyie nsɛm no, na wɔde deɛ wɔatwerɛ wɔ mu no sie; na ɛberɛ no abɛn.
Yohane de kɔma asafo ahodoɔ nson a ɛwɔ Asia no: Adom ne asomdwoeɛ mfiri deɛ ɔwɔ hɔ seesei, deɛ na ɔwɔ hɔ dada, deɛ ɔreba no ne ahonhom nson a ɛwɔ n’ahennwa anim,
ne Yesu Kristo a ɔyɛ ɔdansefoɔ nokwafoɔ ne awufoɔ mu abakan ne asase so ahene sodifoɔ no nkyɛn nka mo. Deɛ ɔdɔ yɛn, na ɔde ne mogya adware yɛn afiri yɛn bɔne mu,
na wayɛ yɛn ahemman sɛ yɛnyɛ asɔfoɔ mma n’Agya Nyankopɔn no, ɔno na wɔmfa animuonyam ne tumi mma no daa daa. Amen.

block_quote.content: Hwɛ, ɔnam mununkum mu reba,
na aniwa nyinaa bɛhu no,
ɛne wɔn a wɔwɔɔ no pea no,
na asase so mmusua nyinaa bɛbɔ ne ho bena.
Saa ara na ɛbɛyɛ. Amen.

verse.content: Awurade se:

wj.content: Mene Alfa ne Omega no, deɛ ɔwɔ hɔ, na ɔwɔ hɔ dada na ɔreba, adeɛ nyinaa so tumfoɔ no.

verse.content: Me, Yohane a meyɛ mo nua ne Yesu ahohia ne ahennie ne boasetɔ no mu yɔnkoɔ no, ɛsiane Nyankopɔn asɛm ne Yesu adanseɛ nti, mewɔ supɔ a wɔfrɛ no Patmo no so.
Mewɔ honhom mu, Awurade da no, na metee nne kɛseɛ bi wɔ m’akyiri sɛ totorobɛnto
sɛ:

wj.content: Twerɛ deɛ wohunu hyɛ nwoma mu, na fa kɔma asafo ahodoɔ nson no, fa kɔ Efeso, Smirna, Pergamo, Tiatira, Sardi, Filadelfia ne Laodikea.

verse.content: Na medanee m’ani sɛ merekɔhwɛ nne a ɛkasa kyerɛɛ me no. Na medanee me ho no, mehunuu sika nkaneadua nson,
na nkaneadua no mfimfini no, mehunuu obi a ɔte sɛ onipa ba a ɔhyɛ atadeɛ yuu, na ɔde sika abɔsoɔ abɔ ne koko so.
Na ne tiri ne ne nwi hoa sɛ odwanten ho nwi fitaa, sɛ sukyerɛmma, na n’ani te sɛ ogyaframa,
na ne nan te sɛ yaawa fɛfɛ a adɔ fononoo mu, na ne nne te sɛ nsuo bebree nne,
na ɔkura nsoromma nson wɔ ne nifa mu, na afena anofanu nnamnnam firi n’anomu, na n’anim te sɛ owia rehyerɛn n’ahoɔden mu.
Na mehunuu no no, mehwee ne nan ase sɛ owufoɔ, na ɔde ne nsa nifa too me so ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ:

wj.content: Nsuro, mene ɔkannifoɔ ne okyidifoɔ,
ne deɛ ɔte aseɛ no. Na mewui, na hwɛ, mete ase daa daa, na mekura Owuo ne asamando nsafoa.
Twerɛ deɛ wohunu, ne deɛ ɛwɔ hɔ, ne deɛ yei akyiri no ɛrebɛba:
Nsoromma nson a wohunu no me nifa soɔ no ahuntasɛm no, ne sika akaneadua nson no: Nsoromma nson no yɛ asafo nson no abɔfoɔ, na akaneadua nson a wohunuiɛ no yɛ asafo nson no.
Efeso asafo mu bɔfoɔ no, twerɛ kɔma no sɛ: Sɛɛ na deɛ ɔkura nsoromma nson ne nifa mu, deɛ ɔnam sika nkaneadua nson no mfimfini no seɛ:
Menim wo nnwuma ne wo brɛ ne wo boasetɔ, ɛne sɛ wontumi nkura wɔn a wɔyɛ abɔnefoɔ, na woasɔ wɔn a wɔse wɔyɛ asomafoɔ na wɔnyɛ no ahwɛ, na woahu wɔn sɛ atorofoɔ.
Na wowɔ boasetɔ, na me din nti, woahunu amane, nanso woampa aba.
Nanso mewɔ wo ho asɛm bi, ɛne sɛ, woagya wo kane dɔ no.
Enti kae deɛ wofiri hwee aseɛ, na sakyera w’adwene, na yɛ kane nnwuma no! Anyɛ saa a, mɛba wo so na mabɛyi wo kaneadua mafiri ne siberɛ, gye sɛ wosakyera w’adwene.
Nanso yei na wowɔ, sɛ wotan Nikolaifoɔ nnwuma a me nso metan no.
Deɛ ɔwɔ aso no ntie deɛ Honhom no reka kyerɛ asafo ahodoɔ no: Deɛ ɔdi nkonim no, mɛma no nkwadua a ɛsi Nyankopɔn paradise mu no aba bi adi.
Na Smirna asafo mu bɔfoɔ no, twerɛ kɔma no sɛ: Sɛɛ na ɔkannifoɔ ne okyidifoɔ, deɛ ɔwuiɛ na ɔte ase bio no seɛ:
Menim w’ahohia ne wo hia no, nanso woyɛ ɔdefoɔ, ne wɔn a wɔse wɔyɛ Yudafoɔ, nanso wɔnyɛ, na mmom wɔyɛ Satan hyiadan no abususɛm.
Nsuro amaneɛ a worebɛhunu biara. Hwɛ, ɔbonsam de mo mu binom bɛgu afiase, na wɔasɔ mo ahwɛ, na mobɛhunu amane dadu. Di nokorɛ kɔduru owuo mu, na mɛma wo nkwa abotire.
Deɛ ɔwɔ aso no ntie deɛ Honhom no reka kyerɛ asafo ahodoɔ no: Deɛ ɔdi nkonim no, owuprenu renka no.
Na Pergamo asafo mu bɔfoɔ no, twerɛ kɔma no sɛ: Sɛɛ na deɛ ɔkura afena anofanu nnamnnam no seɛ:
Menim faako a woteɛ, deɛ Satan ahennwa sie, na wokura me din mu, na woampa me gyidie, nna a wɔkumm me danseni nokwafoɔ Antipa wɔ mo hɔ no mu, deɛ ɔbonsam teɛ hɔ.
Nanso mewɔ wo ho nsɛm kakra: Sɛ wowɔ nnipa wɔ wo hɔ a wɔkura Bileam nkyerɛkyerɛ mu, deɛ ɔkyerɛɛ Balak sɛ ɔnto Israel mma suntidua na wɔnni nam a wɔakum ama abosom, na wɔmmɔ adwaman no.
Saa ara nso na wowɔ wɔn a wɔkura Nikolaifoɔ nkyerɛkyerɛ no mu.
Enti sakyera w’adwene! Anyɛ saa a, mɛba wo so ntɛm, na mede m’anomu afena ne wɔn ako.

Deɛ ɔwɔ aso no ntie deɛ Honhom no reka kyerɛ asafo ahodoɔ no: Deɛ ɔdi nkonim no, mɛma no mana a ahunta no bi adi, na mɛma no ɔboɔ fitaa, na ɔboɔ no so na wɔatwerɛ din foforɔ bi a obiara nnim, sɛ deɛ ɔnya no nko.
Na Tiatira asafo mu bɔfoɔ no, twerɛ kɔma no sɛ: Sɛɛ na Nyankopɔn Ba a n’ani te sɛ ogyaframa na ne nan te sɛ yaawa fɛfɛ no seɛ:
Menim wo nnwuma ne wo dɔ ne wo gyidie ne wo som ne wo boasetɔ no ne sɛ wo nnwuma a ɛdi akyire sene deɛ ɛdi kan no.
Nanso mewɔ wo ho asɛm, sɛ woma ɔbaa Isebel a ɔfrɛ ne ho sɛ odiyifoɔ no kwan sɛ ɔnkyerɛkyerɛ na ɔnnaadaa me nkoa na wɔmmɔ adwaman na wɔnni nam a wɔakum ama abosom.
Na mama no berɛ sɛ ɔmfa nsakyera n’adwene mfiri n’adwamammɔ mu, na wansakyera.
Hwɛ, mede no bɛto mpa so, na mede wɔn a wɔne no sɛe awadeɛ no magu ahohia kɛseɛ mu, gye sɛ wɔasakyera wɔn adwene wɔ wɔn nnwuma mu.
Na mede owuo bɛkum ne mma, na asafo no nyinaa ahunu sɛ, mene deɛ ɔhwehwɛ adwene ne akoma mu, na mɛma mo mu biara sɛdeɛ mo nnwuma teɛ.
Na mese mo a moaka Tiatira no, dodoɔ a wɔnni saa nkyerɛkyerɛ yi, wɔn a wɔnhunuu Satan bunu mu, sɛdeɛ wɔka no no, sɛ: Merensoa mo adesoa foforɔ.
Nanso deɛ mowɔ no, monsɔ mu den nkɔsi sɛ mɛba.
Na deɛ ɔdi nkonim ne deɛ ɔkura me nnwuma mu kɔsi awieeɛ no,
mɛma no amanaman so tumi,
na ɔde dadeɛ poma bɛyɛne wɔn,
na ɔbɛbobɔ wɔn sɛ ɔnwomfoɔ nkukuo,
sɛdeɛ me nso menyaeɛ wɔ m’Agya nsa mu no; na mɛma no adekyeeɛ nsoromma no.
Deɛ ɔwɔ aso no ntie deɛ Honhom no reka kyerɛ asafo ahodoɔ no.
Na Sardi asafo mu bɔfoɔ no, twerɛ kɔma no sɛ: Sɛɛ na deɛ ɔwɔ Nyankopɔn ahonhom nson ne nsoromma nson no seɛ: Menim wo nnwuma, sɛ wowɔ din sɛ wote aseɛ, nanso woawuo.
Nyane, na hyɛ nkaeɛ a ɛrebɛwuo no den. Na menhunuu wo nnwuma sɛ ɛyɛ pɛ me Nyankopɔn anim.
Enti kae sɛdeɛ woanya na woateɛ na di so, na sakyera w’adwene! Na sɛ woanwɛn a, mɛba sɛ owifoɔ, na worenhunu dɔn ko a mɛba wo soɔ.
Nanso wowɔ nnipa kakraa bi a wɔnguu wɔn ntadeɛ ho fi wɔ Sardi, na wɔne me bɛnante ntadeɛ fitaa mu, ɛfiri sɛ wɔfata.
Deɛ ɔdi nkonim no na wɔbɛhyɛ no atadeɛ fitaa saa, na merempepa ne din mfiri nkwa nwoma no mu, na mɛbɔ ne din m’Agya ne n’abɔfoɔ anim.
Deɛ ɔwɔ aso no ntie deɛ Honhom no reka kyerɛ asafo ahodoɔ no.
Na Filadelfia asafo mu bɔfoɔ no, twerɛ kɔma no sɛ:
Sɛɛ na ɔkronkronni, ɔnokwafoɔ no,
deɛ ɔkura Dawid safoa,
na ɔhini a obi nto mu,
na ɔto mu, a obi nhini no, seɛ:
Menim wo nnwuma. Hwɛ, mede ɛpono a wɔahini masi w’anim a obi ntumi nto mu, ɛfiri sɛ wowɔ ahoɔden ketewa bi, na woadi m’asɛm so, na woampa me din.
Hwɛ, mede ebinom a wɔfiri Satan hyiadan mu, a wɔka sɛ wɔyɛ Yudafoɔ, na wɔnyɛ, na mmom wɔdi atorɔ no mema. Hwɛ, mɛma wɔaba na wɔabɛkoto wo nan ase, na wɔahunu sɛ madɔ wo.
Ɛsiane sɛ woadi me boasetɔ asɛm soɔ nti, me nso mɛkora wo, sɔhwɛ berɛ a ɛbɛba wiase nyinaa soɔ, sɛ wɔbɛsɔ wɔn a wɔte asase soɔ ahwɛ no, mu.
Mereba ntɛm; sɔ deɛ wowɔ no mu, na obi annye w’abotire.

Deɛ ɔdi nkonim no, mɛyɛ no fadum me Nyankopɔn asɔredan mu, na ɔremfiri adi bio, na mɛtwerɛ me Nyankopɔn din wɔ ne so, ne me Nyankopɔn kuro a ɛyɛ Yerusalem foforɔ, a ɛfiri soro ba fam firi me Nyankopɔn nkyɛn no din, ne me din foforɔ no.
Deɛ ɔwɔ aso no ntie deɛ Honhom no ka kyerɛ asafo ahodoɔ no.
Na Laodikea asafo mu bɔfoɔ no, twerɛ kɔma no sɛ: Sɛɛ na Amen, ɔdanseni a ɔsɛ sɛ wɔgye no die na ɔyɛ ɔnokwafoɔ no, Nyankopɔn abɔdeɛ farebae no seɛ:
Menim wo nnwuma sɛ wonyɛ nwunu na wonyɛ hyeɛ. Sɛ woyɛ nwunu anaa woyɛ hye a, anka ɛyɛ.
Na afei deɛ, ɛnam sɛ woyɛ boturobodwo na wonyɛ hyeɛ anaa nwunu nti, mɛfe wo mafiri m’anomu.
Ɛfiri sɛ wose: Meyɛ ɔdefoɔ na manya me ho, na hwee nhia me, na wonnim sɛ wo ara ne ɔmanehunufoɔ ne mmɔborɔni ne ohiani ne onifirani ne ɔdagyani.
Metu wo fo sɛ, tɔ me nkyɛn sika a wɔabere ho ogya mu, na woanya ahonya ne atadeɛ fitaa, na woahyɛ, na w’adagya ahohora anna adi, ne aniduro a wode bɛsra w’ani, na woahunu adeɛ.
Dodoɔ a medɔ wɔn no, meyi wɔn atɛn, na metwe wɔn aso. Enti bɔ mmɔden na sakyera w’adwene!
Hwɛ, megyina ɛpono ano na mebɔ mu. Sɛ obi bɛtie me nne na wahini ɛpono no a, mɛhyɛne mu maba ne nkyɛn, na me ne no abɛdidi, na ɔne me nso adidi.
Deɛ ɔdi nkonim no, mɛma ɔne me atena m’ahennwa so, sɛdeɛ me nso madi nkonim na me ne m’Agya te n’ahennwa soɔ no.
Deɛ ɔwɔ aso no ntie deɛ Honhom no ka kyerɛ asafo ahodoɔ no.

verse.content: Yei akyiri no, mehwɛe, na hwɛ, wɔahini ɛpono ɔsoro, na ɛnne a metee kane sɛ totorobɛnto a ɛne me kasaeɛ no se: Foro bra ha na mɛkyerɛ wo deɛ ɛtwa sɛ yeinom akyiri no ɛba.
Na ntɛm ara na mewɔ Honhom mu. Na hwɛ, wɔde ahennwa asi soro, na obi te ahennwa no so.
Na deɛ ɔte soɔ no, wohwɛ no a, ɔte sɛ ahwehwɛboɔ ne bogyanamboɔ, na nyankontɔn a wohwɛ a, ɛte sɛ ahahammonoboɔ atwa ahennwa no ho ahyia.
Na nhennwa aduonu nan atwa ahennwa no ho ahyia, na mehunuu mpanimfoɔ aduonu nan sɛ wɔtete nhennwa no so hyehyɛ ntadeɛ fitaa na sika abotire bobɔ wɔn ti.
Na anyinam ne ɛnne ahodoɔ ne aprannaa firi ahennwa no mu firii adi, na ogya nkanea nson a ɛyɛ Nyankopɔn ahonhom nson no redɛre ahennwa no anim.
Na ahwehwɛ po a ɛte sɛ ahwehwɛ wɔ ahennwa no anim, na ateasefoɔ baanan a ani ayeyɛ wɔn anim ne wɔn akyiri mama wowɔ ahennwa no ho wɔ mfimfini, na wɔatwa ahennwa no ho ahyia.
Na ɔteasefoɔ a ɔdi kan no te sɛ gyata, na ɔteasefoɔ a ɔtɔ so mmienu no te sɛ nantwie ba, na ɔteasefoɔ a ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa no wɔ anim te sɛ onipa, na ɔteasefoɔ a ɔtɔ so nnan no te sɛ ɔkɔdeɛ a ɔtuo.
Na ateasefoɔ baanan no mu biara wɔ ntaban nsia, na aniwa ahyehyɛ wɔn ho ne wɔn mu mama, na wɔto dwom daa awia ne anadwo sɛ:

block_quote.content: Kronkron, kronkron, kronkron
ne Awurade Nyankopɔn, ade nyinaa so tumfoɔ
a ɔtenaa hɔ, na ɔwɔ hɔ, na ɔrebɛba.

verse.content: Na sɛ ateasefoɔ no de animuonyam ne anidie ne aseda ma deɛ ɔte ahennwa no soɔ, a ɔte ase daa daa no a,
mpanimfoɔ aduonu nan no hwehwe ase, deɛ ɔte ahennwa no soɔ no anim, na wɔkoto deɛ ɔte ase daa daa no, na wɔyiyi wɔn abotire no gu ahennwa no anim ka sɛ:

block_quote.content: Yɛn Awurade ne yɛn Nyankopɔn, wofata sɛ
wogye animuonyam ne anidie ne tumi,
ɛfiri sɛ wo na wobɔɔ nnoɔma nyinaa,
na wo pɛ nti na wɔwɔ hɔ, na wɔbɔeɛ.

verse.content: Na mehunuu nwoma bi wɔ deɛ ɔte ahennwa no soɔ no nifa mu a wɔatwerɛ emu ne akyire, na wɔde nsɔano nson asosɔ ano.
Na mehunuu ɔbɔfoɔ hoɔdenfoɔ bi a ɔde nne kɛseɛ teaa mu sɛ: Hwan na ɔfata sɛ ɔbue nwoma no mu na ɔte ne nsɔano no?
Na obiara nni soro anaa asase so anaa asase ase a ɔbɛtumi abue nwoma no mu anaasɛ ɔbɛhwɛ mu.
Na mesuu pii, ɛfiri sɛ wɔnhunu obi a ɔfata sɛ ɔbɛbue nwoma no mu anaasɛ ɔbɛhwɛ mu.
Na mpanimfoɔ no mu baako ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Nsu, hwɛ, Yuda abusuakuo mu Gyata no, Dawid nhini no adi nkonim sɛ ɔbɛbue nwoma no mu na watete ne nsɔano nson no.

Na mehwɛe, na ahennwa no ne ateasefoɔ baanan no ntam ne mpanimfoɔ no ntam no, adwammaa bi gyina hɔ a ɔte sɛdeɛ wɔaku no. Ɔwɔ mmɛn nson ne ani nson a ɛyɛ Nyankopɔn ahonhom nson a wɔasoma wɔn kɔ asase nyinaa soɔ no.
Na ɔba bɛgyee nwoma no firii deɛ ɔte ahennwa no soɔ no nifa mu.
Na ɔgyee nwoma no no, ateasefoɔ baanan no ne mpanimfoɔ aduonu nan no hwehwee ase adwammaa no anim, wɔn nyinaa kurakura nsankuo ne sika mfamfa a ohwam a ɛyɛ ahotefoɔ mpaebɔ no ayɛ no mama.
Na wɔtoo dwom foforɔ sɛ:

block_quote.content: Wofata sɛ wogye nwoma no
na wobue ne nsɔano no,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔaku wo, na wode wo mogya atɔ yɛn ama Onyankopɔn,
afiri mmusua ne ɔkasa ne nkurɔfoɔ ne aman nyinaa mu,
na woayɛ wɔn ahemman ne asɔfoɔ ama yɛn Nyankopɔn,
na wɔbɛdi asase so ahene.

verse.content: Na mehwɛe, na metee abɔfoɔ bebree a wɔatwa ahennwa no ne ateasefoɔ no ne mpanimfoɔ no ho kɔntɔnkrɔn nne, wɔn ano si mpempem ne mpem ahodoɔ mpem,
na wɔde nne kɛseɛ kaa sɛ:

block_quote.content: Adwammaa a wɔkumm no no fata sɛ
ɔgye tumi, ne ahonya, ne nyansa, ne ahoɔden, ne anidie,
ne animuonyam ne nhyira.

verse.content: Na abɔdeɛ a ɛwɔ soro ne asase soɔ ne asase ase ne ɛpo so ne deɛ ɛwɔ mu nyinaa, metee sɛ wɔse:

block_quote.content: Nhyira ne anidie ne animuonyam
ne tumi nka deɛ ɔte ahennwa no soɔ, ne adwammaa no
daa daa!

verse.content: Na ateasefoɔ baanan no kaa sɛ: Amen. Na mpanimfoɔ no hwehwee ase, na wɔkoto sɔree.
Na mehunuu sɛ adwammaa no tee nsɔano no mu baako ano, na metee sɛ ateasefoɔ baanan no mu baako de nne a ɛte sɛ aprannaa kaa sɛ: Bra!
Na mehunui na hwɛ, ɔpɔnkɔ fitaa bi nie, na deɛ ɔte ne soɔ no kura tadua. Na wɔmaa no abotire, na ɔfirii adi a ɔredi nkonim na wakɔdi nkonim.
Na ɔtee nsɔano a ɛtɔ so mmienu no ano no, metee sɛ ɔteasefoɔ a ɔtɔ so mmienu no se: Bra!
Na ɔpɔnkɔ foforɔ kɔkɔɔ bi firii adi, na wɔmaa deɛ ɔte ne soɔ no ahoɔden sɛ ɔmmɛyi asomdwoeɛ mfiri asase so na wɔnkunkum wɔn ho wɔn ho, na wɔmaa no nkrantɛ kɛseɛ bi.
Na ɔtee nsɔano a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa no ano no, metee sɛ ɔteasefoɔ a ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa no se: Bra! Na mehunui, na hwɛ, ɔpɔnkɔ tuntum bi nie, na deɛ ɔte ne soɔ no kura nsania wɔ ne nsa mu.
Na metee nne bi ateasefoɔ baanan no mfimfini a ɛse: Yɛ ayuo susukoraa denare,
na yɛ aburoo susukoraa mmiɛnsa denare; nanso ngo ne nsa deɛ, nyɛ no hwee!
Na ɔtee nsɔano a ɛtɔ so nnan no ano no, metee sɛ ɔteasefoɔ a ɔtɔ so nnan no se: Bra!

Na mehunui na hwɛ, ɔpɔnkɔ nsonso bi nie, na deɛ ɔte ne soɔ no din de Owuo, na Asamando di n’akyi. Na wɔmaa wɔn asase abupɛn nnan mu baako so tumi sɛ wɔmfa afena ne ɛkɔm ne owuo ne asase so mmoa nkunkum wɔn.
Na ɔtee nsɔano a ɛtɔ so nnum no ano no, mehunuu wɔn a Nyankopɔn asɛm ne wɔn adanseɛ a wɔdiiɛ nti wɔakunkum wɔn no akra, afɔrebukyia no ase.
Na wɔde nne kɛseɛ teaa mu sɛ: Awurade Tumfoɔ, Ɔkronkronni ne Ɔnokwafoɔ, ɛnkɔsi da bɛn na woremmu atɛn, na worentɔ wɔn a wɔte asase soɔ no yɛn mogya so were?
Na wɔmaa wɔn mu biara atadeɛ fitaa, na wɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnhome berɛ tiaa bi bio, nkɔsi sɛ wɔn nwurakwaa ne wɔn nuanom a wɔbɛkum wɔn te sɛ wɔn no nso dodoɔ bɛso ano.
Na ɔtee nsɔano a ɛtɔ so nsia no ano no, mehunuu asasewosoɔ kɛseɛ, na owia yɛɛ tumm sɛ ayitoma, na ɔsrane danee sɛ mogya.
Na ɔsoro nsoromma hwehwee asase so te sɛ borɔdɔma a mframa kɛseɛ woso no tete n’aba bunu guo.
Na ɔsoro yeraeɛ sɛ nwoma a wɔabobɔ, na mmepɔ ne nsupɔ nyinaa tutu fifirii deɛ na ɛwowɔ.
Na asase so ahemfo ne nnipa akɛseɛ ne asafohene ne adefoɔ ne ahoɔdenfoɔ ne nkoa ne adehyeɛ nyinaa huntahuntaa abodan ne mmepɔ mu abotan mu.
Na wɔka kyerɛɛ mmepɔ ne abotan no sɛ: Monhwe yɛn so mfa yɛn nhunta mfiri deɛ ɔte ahennwa no soɔ no ne adwammaa no abufuo ho,
ɛfiri sɛ n’abufuo da kɛseɛ no adu, na hwan na ɔbɛtumi agyina ano?

note.content: Na denare yɛ ɔpaani da koro akatua.

verse.content: Yei akyiri no mehunuu abɔfoɔ baanan a wɔgyinagyina asase ntweasoɔ nnan no ano kurakura asase mframa nnan no mu, na mframa ammɔ amfa asase anaa ɛpo anaa dua biara so.
Na mehunuu ɔbɔfoɔ foforɔ a ɔkura Onyankopɔn a ɔte aseɛ no nsɔano sɛ ɔfiri owia apueeɛ reba, na ɔde nne kɛseɛ teaa mu kyerɛɛ abɔfoɔ baanan a wɔama wɔn kwan sɛ wɔnha asase ne ɛpo no
sɛ: Monnha asase anaa ɛpo anaa nnua kɔsi sɛ yɛde agyiraeɛ bɛsisi yɛn Nyankopɔn nkoa moma soɔ.
Na metee wɔn a wɔasɔ wɔn ano no dodoɔ: Mpem ɔha aduanan nnan na wɔasɔ wɔn ano Israel mma mmusuakuo nyinaa mu.
Yuda abusuakuo mu nnipa a wɔsɔɔ wɔn ano si mpem dummienu, Ruben abusuakuo mu, mpem dummienu, Gad abusuakuo mu, mpem dummienu,
Aser abusuakuo mu, mpem dummienu, Naftali abusuakuo mu, mpem dummienu, Manase abusuakuo mu, mpem dummienu,
Simeon abusuakuo mu, mpem dummienu, Lewi abusuakuo mu, mpem dummienu, Isakar abusuakuo mu, mpem dummienu,
Sebulon abusuakuo mu, mpem dummienu, Yosef abusuakuo mu, mpem dummienu, Benyamin abusuakuo mu nnipa a wɔsɔɔ wɔn ano, mpem dummienu.

Yeinom akyiri no mehunui, na hwɛ, nnipakuo kɛseɛ a obi ntumi nkane wɔn, a wɔfiri aman, ne mmusuakuo, ne nkurɔfoɔ ne kasa nyinaa mu no gyinagyina ahennwa no ne adwammaa no anim hyehyɛ ntade fitaa, na wɔkurakura berɛ.
Na wɔde nne kɛseɛ teaa mu sɛ:

block_quote.content: Nkwagyeɛ no yɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn a ɔte ahennwa no soɔ ne adwammaa no dea.

verse.content: Na abɔfoɔ no nyinaa atwa ahennwa no ne mpanimfoɔ no ne ateasefoɔ baanan no ho ahyia, na wɔde wɔn anim butubutuu fam, ahennwa no anim, na wɔkotoo Onyankopɔn
kaa sɛ:

block_quote.content: Amen, nhyira ne animuonyam ne nyansa
ne aseda ne anidie
ne tumi ne ahoɔden
yɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn dea daa daa. Amen.

verse.content: Na mpanimfoɔ no mu baako bisaa me sɛ: Yeinom a wɔhyehyɛ ntadeɛ yuu fitaa yi yɛ hwannom, na wɔfiri he?
Na meka mekyerɛɛ no sɛ: Owura, wo na wonim. Na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔfiri ahohia kɛseɛ no mu, na wɔahoro wɔn ntadeɛ ama no ahoa wɔ adwammaa no mogya no mu.

block_quote.content: Yei nti na wɔwɔ Nyankopɔn ahennwa anim,
na wɔsom no awia ne anadwo n’asɔredan mu,
na deɛ ɔte ahennwa no soɔ no bɛkata wɔn so.
Ɛkɔm renne wɔn bio, nso sukɔm renne wɔn bio,
nanso owia anaa
ahuhuro biara rento wɔn.
Na adwammaa a ɔwɔ ahennwa no mfimfini no bɛyɛ wɔn Hwɛfoɔ,
na ɔde wɔn akɔ nkwa asutire ho,
na Onyankopɔn bɛpepa nisuo nyinaa afiri wɔn aniwa mu.

verse.content: Na ɔtee nsɔano a ɛtɔ so nson no ano no, ɔsoro yɛɛ dinn bɛyɛ sɛ dɔnhwereɛ fa.
Na mehunuu abɔfoɔ baason a wɔgyinagyina Nyankopɔn anim no, na wɔmemaa wɔn ntotorobɛnto nson.
Na ɔbɔfoɔ foforɔ ba bɛgyinaa afɔrebukyia no ho, ɔkura sika hwam kuruwa, na wɔmaa no nnuhwam pii, sɛ ɔmfa nka ahotefoɔ nyinaa mpaebɔ ho, sika afɔrebukyia a ɛsi ahennwa no anim no so.
Na nnuhwam no wisie kaa ahotefoɔ mpaebɔ ho firi ɔbɔfoɔ no nsam foro kɔɔ Nyankopɔn anim.
Na ɔbɔfoɔ no faa ohwam kuruwa no de afɔrebukyia no so gya bi hyɛɛ mu ma, na ɔto guu asase so. Na aprannaa, ne nne ahodoɔ ne anyinam ne asasewosoɔ bae.
Na abɔfoɔ baason a wɔkurakura ntotorobɛnto nson no siesiee wɔn ho sɛ wɔrebɛhyɛne.

Na deɛ ɔdi kan no hyɛnee ne totorobɛnto. Na asukɔtweaa ne ogya a ɛne mogya adi afra bae, na wɔto guu asase so. Na asase nkyekyɛmu mmiɛnsa mu baako hyee, na nnua nkyekyɛmu mmiɛnsa mu baako nso hyee, na nwira mono nyinaa nso hyee.
Na ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔtɔ so mmienu no hyɛnee ne totorobɛnto. Na wɔtoo adeɛ bi a ɛte sɛ bepɔ kɛseɛ a ogya rehyeɛ no twenee po mu, na ɛpo nkyekyɛmu mmiɛnsa mu baako danee mogya,
na abɔdeɛ a ɛwɔ nkwa wɔ po mu no mu nkyekyɛmu mmiɛnsa mu baako wuwui, na ahyɛn nkyekyɛmu mmiɛnsa mu baako nso sɛee.
Na ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa no hyɛnee ne totorobɛnto. Na nsoromma kɛseɛ bi a ɛredɛre sɛ ogyatɛnee firi soro hwee fam, na ɛbɛhwee nsubɔntene nkyekyɛmu mmiɛnsa mu baako ne nsuo aniwa so.
Na nsoromma no din de Ɔnwono, na nsuo no nkyekyɛmu mmiɛnsa mu baako yɛɛ nwono, na nnipa pii wuwui, nsuo no nwono a ayɛ no nti.

Na ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔtɔ so nnan no hyɛnee ne totorobɛnto. Na wɔbɔɔ owia nkyekyɛmu mmiɛnsa mu baako, ne ɔsrane nkyekyɛmu mmiɛnsa mu baako, ne nsoromma nkyekyɛmu mmiɛnsa mu baako, na wɔn nkyekyɛmu mmiɛnsa mu baako no duduruu sum, na adekyeeɛ mu nkyekyɛmu mmiɛnsa mu baako anhyerɛn, na anadwo nso saa ara.
Na mehunui, na metee sɛ ɔkɔdeɛ baako a ɔtu faa soro mfimfini no de nne kɛseɛ teaa mu sɛ: Wɔn a wɔte asase soɔ no nnue, wɔnnue, wɔnnue, totorobɛnto a aka a abɔfoɔ baasa no rebɛhyɛne no nne no nti!
Na ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔtɔ so nnum no hyɛnee ne totorobɛnto. Na mehunuu nsoromma bi a ɛfiri soro atɔ asase soɔ, na wɔde ebunu abura ano safoa maa no.
Na ɔbuee ebunu abura no ano, na wisie a ɛte sɛ fononoo kɛseɛ mu wisie firii abura no mu, na owia ne ahunum duruu sum, abura no mu wisie no nti.
Na ntutummɛ firii wisie no mu baa asase so, na wɔmaa wɔn tumi a ɛsɛ asase so anyanyankyerɛ tumi.
Na wɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, wɔnnka asase so wura, anaa ahahan mono biara, anaa dua biara, gye nnipa a wɔnni Nyankopɔn nsɔano wɔ wɔn moma soɔ no nko.
Na wɔmaa wɔn kwan sɛ wɔnnkum wɔn, na mmom wɔnha wɔn abosome nnum. Na wɔn haw no te sɛ anyanyankyerɛ a ɔka onipa bi deɛ.
Na nna no mu no, nnipa bɛhwehwɛ owuo, na wɔrennya, na wɔbɛpɛ sɛ wɔwuo, nanso owuo bɛdwane wɔn.
Na ntutummɛ no suban te sɛ apɔnkɔ a wɔasiesie wɔn ama ɔko deɛ, na biribi wowɔ wɔn tiri so te sɛ sika abotire, na wɔn anim tete sɛ nnipa deɛ.
Na wɔwowɔ nwi te sɛ mmaa nwi, na wɔn se tete sɛ agyata se.
Na wɔwowɔ nkataboɔ te sɛ dadeɛ nkataboɔ, na wɔn ntaban mu gyegyeegye te sɛ apɔnkɔ bebree a wɔrekɔ ɔsa nteaseɛnam deɛ.
Na wɔwowɔ dua te sɛ anyanyankyerɛ, na nwowɔeɛ wowɔ wɔn dua mu, na wɔn dua mu na wɔn tumi a wɔde ha nnipa abosome nnum no wɔ.
Na wɔwɔ wɔn so hene a ɛyɛ bunu no mu bɔfoɔ a wɔfrɛ ne din wɔ Hebri kasa mu sɛ Abadon, na Hela kasa mu deɛ, ɔde Apolion.
Mmusuo baako atwa mu. Hwɛ, yei akyiri Mmusuo mmienu da so reba.
Na ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔtɔ so nsia no hyɛnee ne totorobɛnto. Na metee nne bi a ɛfiri sika afɔrebukyia a ɛsi Nyankopɔn anim no mmɛn nnan no mu,
a ɛka kyerɛ ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔtɔ so nsia a ɔwɔ totorobɛnto no sɛ: Sanesane abɔfoɔ baanan a wɔasesa wɔn asubɔnten kɛseɛ Eufrate ho no.
Na wɔsanesanee abɔfoɔ baanan a wɔasiesie wɔn ama ɛdɔn ne ɛda ne bosome ne afe no sɛ wɔnkunkum nnipa nkyekyɛmu mmiɛnsa mu baako.
Na metee sɛ ɛdɔm a wɔtete apɔnkɔ soɔ no ano si ɔpedu ahodoɔ ɔpeduonu.
Na sɛdeɛ mehunuu apɔnkɔ ne wɔn a wɔtete wɔn soɔ no, anisoadehunu no mu nie: Wɔwɔ ogya ne afasebire ne sɔfe nkataboɔ, na apɔnkɔ no ti tete sɛ gyata ti, na ogya ne wisie ne sɔfe fifiri wɔn anomu.
Wɔnam ɔhaw mmiɛnsa yi so de ogya ne wisie ne sɔfe a ɛfifiri wɔn anomu no so kunkumm nnipa nkyekyɛmu mmiɛnsa mu baako.
Na apɔnkɔ no ahoɔden wɔ wɔn ano ne wɔn dua mu. Na wɔn dua no tete sɛ awɔ, na ɛwowɔ tire, na ɛno na wɔde pira.

Na nnipa a aka a wɔankum wɔn wɔ ɔhaw ahodoɔ yi mu no ansakyera wɔn adwene amfiri wɔn nneyɛɛ ho, sɛ wɔrensɔre ahonhommɔne ne sika, ne dwetɛ, ne yaawa, ne aboɔ, ne dua honi a ɛnhunu adeɛ na ɛnte asɛm nanso ɛntumi nnanteɛ no.
Na wɔansakyera wɔn adwene amfiri wɔn awudie ne wɔn adutoɔ ne wɔn adwamammɔ ne wɔn korɔno ho.
Na mehunuu ɔbɔfoɔ foforɔ hoɔdenfoɔ bi sɛ ɔfiri soro reba fam, na ɔfira mununkum, na nyankontɔn wɔ ne tiri so, na n’anim te sɛ owia, na ne nan te sɛ ogya fadum.
Na ɔkura nwoma ketewa bi a emu abue wɔ ne nsa mu, na ɔde ne nan nifa sii po so, na ɔde benkum sii asase so.
Na ɔde nne kɛseɛ teaa mu sɛdeɛ gyata bobɔ mu. Na ɔteaa mu no, aprannaa nson no de wɔn nne kasae.
Na aprannaa nson no kasaeɛ no, anka mereyɛ matwerɛ. Na metee sɛ ɛnne bi firi soro reka kyerɛ me sɛ: Sɔ deɛ aprannaa nson no aka no ano, na ntwerɛ!
Na ɔbɔfoɔ a mehunuu no sɛ ɔgyina po ne asase soɔ no

block_quote.content: maa ne nsa so kyerɛɛ soro.
Na ɔkaa deɛ ɔte ase daa daa,
a ɔbɔɔ ɔsoro ne deɛ ɛwɔ mu ne asase ne deɛ ɛwɔ mu, ne ɛpo ne deɛ ɛwɔ mu no ho ntam sɛ: Berɛ bi nni hɔ bio,

verse.content: na mmom nna a ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔtɔ so nson no bɛhyɛne n’abɛn no, na Onyankopɔn ahuntasɛm no aba mu, sɛdeɛ ɔkaa ho asɛmpa kyerɛɛ ne nkoa, adiyifoɔ no.
Na ɛnne a mete firii soro no ne me kasaa bio sɛ: Kɔ kɔgye nwoma ketewa a wɔabue mu no ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔgyina asase ne po soɔ no nsam.
Na mekɔɔ ɔbɔfoɔ no nkyɛn mekɔka mekyerɛɛ no sɛ ɔmfa nwoma ketewa no mma me. Na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Gye mene, na ɛbɛyɛ nwononwono wo yam, na w’anomu deɛ, ɛbɛyɛ fremfrem sɛ ɛwoɔ.
Na megyee nwoma ketewa no firii ɔbɔfoɔ no nsa mu memeneeɛ, na ɛyɛɛ fremfrem wɔ m’anomu sɛ ɛwoɔ, na mewiee die no, ɛyɛɛ nwononwono wɔ me yam.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Ɛsɛ sɛ woka nkurɔfoɔ ne aman ne ɔkasa ne ahemfo bebree ho adiyisɛm bio.
Na wɔmaa me demmire a ɛte sɛ abaa kaa sɛ: Sɔre na susu Nyankopɔn asɔredan ne afɔrebukyia ne wɔn a wɔsɔre wɔ mu no.
Na adihɔ a ɛwɔ asɔredan no ho no deɛ, gya to hɔ, na nsusu, ɛfiri sɛ wɔde ama amanaman mufoɔ, na wɔbɛtiatia kuro kronkron no so abosome aduanan mmienu.
Na mɛma m’adansefoɔ baanu afirafira ayitoma abɛka adiyisɛm nna apem ahanu aduosia.
Yeinom ne ngodua mmienu ne akaneadua mmienu a ɛgyinagyina asase wura anim no.
Na sɛ obi pɛ sɛ ɔha wɔn a, ogya firi wɔn anomu bɛmene wɔn atamfoɔ, na sɛ obi pɛ sɛ ɔha wɔn a, ɛtwa sɛ wɔku no saa ara.
Yeinom wɔ tumi sɛ wɔto ɔsoro mu, na osuo ntɔ wɔn adiyie nna no mu, na wɔwɔ nsuo so tumi sɛ wɔma no dane mogya ne sɛ wɔde haw biara ha asase da biara a wɔpɛ.
Na sɛ wɔwie wɔn adansedie a, aboa a ɔfiri ebunu no mu no bɛtu wɔn so sa, na wadi wɔn so nkonim na wɔaku wɔn.
Na wɔn afunu bɛdeda kuro kɛseɛ no abɔntene so, kuro a honhom mu wɔfrɛ no Sodom ne Misraim, deɛ wɔbɔɔ wɔn Awurade nso asɛnnua mu no.
Na nkurɔfoɔ ne mmusuakuo ne kasa ahodoɔ ne aman mu binom bɛhwɛ wɔn afunu nnansa ne fa, na wɔremma wɔmfa wɔn afunu no ntoto ɛda mu.
Na wɔn a wɔtete asase soɔ ani bɛgye wɔn ho, na wɔn bo atɔ wɔn yamu, na wɔamanemane wɔn ho adeɛ, ɛfiri sɛ adiyifoɔ baanu yi ateetee wɔn a wɔte asase soɔ.
Na nnansa ne fa akyiri no, nkwa honhom firii Nyankopɔn mu bɛhyɛnee wɔn mu, na wɔgyinagyinaa wɔn nan so, na ehu kɛseɛ kaa wɔn a wɔhunuu wɔn no.
Na wɔtee nne kɛseɛ bi firi soro a ɛka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Momforo mmra ha! Na wɔforo faa mununkum no mu, na wɔn atamfoɔ no hunuu wɔn.
Na ɛdɔn no ara mu asase wosoo kɛse, na kuro no nkyekyɛmu du mu baako hwee ase, na asasewosoɔ no kumm nnipa mpemnson. Na wɔn a ɛkaeɛ no suroe, na wɔhyɛɛ ɔsoro Nyankopɔn animuonyam.
Mmusuo a ɛtɔ so mmienu no atwa mu. Hwɛ, Mmusuo a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa reba ntɛm.
Na ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔtɔ so nson no hyɛnee ne totorobɛnto. Na ɛnne akɛseɛ gyegyegyegyee soro sɛ:

block_quote.content: Wiase ahennie ayɛ yɛn Awurade
ne ne Kristo no dea,
na ɔbɛdi hene daa daa.

verse.content: Na mpanimfoɔ aduonu nnan a wɔtete wɔn nhennwa soɔ Nyankopɔn anim no de wɔn anim butubutuu fam, na wɔkotoo Onyankopɔn
kaa sɛ:

block_quote.content: Yɛda wo, Awurade Nyankopɔn, ade nyinaa so Tumfoɔ
a na wowɔ hɔ dada, na wowɔ hɔ no ase,
sɛ woafa wo tumi kɛseɛ,
na woadi hene.
Na amanaman no bo afu,
na w’abufuo ne awufoɔ berɛ no
aduru sɛ wobɛbu atɛn,
na woama wo nkoa, adiyifoɔ
ne ahotefoɔ ne wɔn a wɔsuro wo din,
nketewa ne akɛseɛ no akatua,
na woasɛe wɔn a wɔasɛe asase no.

verse.content: Na wɔhinii Nyankopɔn asɔredan no ɔsoro, na wɔhunuu n’apam adaka no n’asɔredan no mu. Na anyinam, ne ɛnne, ne aprannaa, ne asasewosoɔ ne asukɔtweaaguo kɛseɛ bae.
Na nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ kɛseɛ bi yii ne ho adi ɔsoro. Ɔbaa bi a ɔfira owia, na ɔsrane wɔ ne nan aseɛ, na nsoromma dummienu abotire bobɔ ne tire
na wafa afuro, na ɔretea mu reko awoɔ, na awoɔ aden no.
Na nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ foforɔ yii ne ho adi wɔ ɔsoro, na hwɛ, ɔtweaseɛ kakraka kɔkɔɔ a ɔwɔ tire nson ne mmɛn du, na ahemmotire nson bobɔ ne ti.
Na ɔde ne dua twee ɔsoro nsoromma nkyekyɛmu mmiɛnsa mu baako, na ɔtoto guu asase so. Na ɔtweaseɛ no bɛgyinaa ɔbaa a ɔrebɛwoɔ no anim, na sɛ ɔwo a, wamene ne ba no.
Na ɔwoo ɔbabanin a ɔde dadeɛ poma bɛdi amanaman nyinaa so. Na wɔfaa ne ba no de no kɔɔ Nyankopɔn ne n’ahennwa no nkyɛn.
Na ɔbaa no dwane kɔɔ ɛserɛ so, deɛ Onyankopɔn asiesie baabi ama no sɛ wɔnhwɛ no hɔ nna apem ahanu aduosia.
Na ɔko baa ɔsoro. Mikael ne n’abɔfoɔ tuu ɔtweaseɛ no so sa ne no koe. Na ɔtweaseɛ no ne n’abɔfoɔ koe.
Na wɔdii wɔn so, na wɔannya kwan ɔsoro bio.
Na wɔtuu ɔtweaseɛ kɛseɛ no, ɔwɔ dada no a wɔfrɛ no Ɔbonsam ne Satan, deɛ ɔdaadaa amanaman nyinaa no, firii hɔ too no twenee asase so, na wɔtoo n’abɔfoɔ kaa ne ho gui.
Na metee nne kɛseɛ ɔsoro sɛ:

block_quote.content: Afei nkwagyeɛ ne tumi
ne ahennie ayɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn dea,
na tumi ayɛ ne Kristo no dea,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔato yɛn nuanom anototofoɔ no atwene;
ɔno na ɔtoto wɔn ano yɛn Nyankopɔn anim awia ne anadwo.
Na wɔnam Adwammaa no mogya
ne wɔn adanseɛ asɛm no so adi ne so nkonim,
na wɔansuro sɛ wɔbɛwuo.
Yei nti, ɔsoro
ne mo a motete mu no,
momma mo bo ntɔ mo yam.
Asase ne ɛpo nnue,
ɛfiri sɛ ɔbonsam asiane aba mo nkyɛn,
na wafa abufuo kɛse,
ɛfiri sɛ ɔnim sɛ ne berɛ a ɔwɔ yɛ tia.

verse.content: Na ɔtweaseɛ no hunuu sɛ wɔato no atwene asase soɔ no, ɔtaa ɔbaa a ɔwoo ɔbabanin no.
Na wɔmaa ɔbaa no ɔkɔdeɛ kɛseɛ no ntaban mmienu sɛ ɔmfa ntu nkɔ ɛserɛ so wɔ ne tenaberɛ, deɛ wɔbɛhwɛ no ɛberɛ ne mmerɛ ne berɛ fa afiri ɔwɔ no anim.
Na ɔwɔ no puu n’anomu nsuo te sɛ asubɔnten guu ɔbaa no akyi, sɛ anka ɛmfa no.
Nanso asase boaa ɔbaa no, na asase buee n’anomu menee asubɔnten a ɔtweaseɛ no pu firii n’anomu no.
Na ɔtweaseɛ no bo fuu ɔbaa no, na ɔkɔtuu n’asefoɔ nkaeɛ a wɔdi Nyankopɔn ahyɛdeɛ soɔ na wɔkura Yesu Kristo adanseɛ no so sa.
Na ɔkɔgyinaa mpoano anwea so.
Na mehunuu aboa bi a ɔwɔ mmɛn du, ɛne tire nson sɛ ɔfiri po mu sɔreeɛ, na ahemmotire du bobɔ ne mmɛn, na abusudin wowɔ ne tiri ho.
Na aboa a mehunuu no no te sɛ ɔsebɔ, na ne nan te sɛ osisire nan, na n’ano te sɛ gyata ano. Na ɔtweaseɛ no de n’ahoɔden ne n’ahennwa ne ne tumi kɛseɛ maa no.
Na mehunuu sɛ ne tire no mu baako te sɛdeɛ wɔabɔ no bɔtorɔ, na wɔasa ne pira no, na aboa no ho yɛɛ wiasefoɔ nyinaa nwanwa maa wɔdii n’akyi.
Na wɔkotoo ɔtweaseɛ no sɛ ɔde tumi ama aboa no, na wɔkotoo aboa no kaa sɛ: Hwan na ɔte sɛ aboa no? Na hwan na ɔbɛtumi ne no ako?
Na wɔmaa no ano a ɔde kaa nsɛm akɛseɛ ne abususɛm, na wɔmaa no kwan abosome aduanan mmienu.
Na ɔbuee n’ano kaa abususɛm tiaa Onyankopɔn, sɛ ɔbɛka ne din ne ne ntomadan ne wɔn a wɔtete soro ho abususɛm.
Na wɔmaa no kwan sɛ ɔntu ahotefoɔ so sa, na ɔnni wɔn so nkonim. Na wɔmaa no mmusuakuo ne nkurɔfoɔ ne kasa ahodoɔ ne aman nyinaa so tumi.
Na wɔn a wɔte asase soɔ nyinaa bɛkoto no, wɔn a wɔamfiri wiase asehyɛ antwerɛ wɔn din Adwammaa a wɔkumm no no nkwa nwoma mu no.
Sɛ obi wɔ aso a, ma no ntie.

block_quote.content: Sɛ obi fa nnommum a,
wɔbɛfa no dommum.
Sɛ obi de nkrantɛ kum a,
ɛtwa sɛ wɔde nkrantɛ ku no.
Ɛha na ahotefoɔ boasetɔ ne gyidie wɔ.

verse.content: Na mehunuu aboa foforɔ bi a ɔfiri asase mu baeɛ, na ɔwɔ mmɛn mmienu sɛ adwammaa, na ɔkasa sɛ ɔtweaseɛ.
Na ɔyɛ aboa a ɔdi kan no ahoɔdenneɛ nyinaa wɔ n’anim, na ɔma asase ne wɔn a wɔtete soɔ koto aboa a ɔdi kan a wɔasa ne wuopira no.
Na ɔyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ akɛseɛ, na ɔma ogya mpo firi soro ba asase so, nnipa anim.
Na nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ a wɔde maa no sɛ ɔnyɛ no aboa no anim nti, ɔdaadaa wɔn a wɔtete asase soɔ no, ka kyerɛɛ asase sotefoɔ no sɛ, wɔnyɛ ohoni mma aboa a nkrantɛ apira no na ɔte ase bio no.
Na wɔmaa no kwan sɛ ɔmma aboa no honi no honhom, na aboa no honi no mpo akasa, na wama wɔakum dodoɔ a wɔnkoto aboa no honi no.
Na ɔma nketewa ne akɛseɛ, adefoɔ ne ahiafoɔ, adehyeɛ ne nkoa nyinaa pene ma wɔhyɛ wɔn agyiraeɛ, wɔn nsa nifa anaa wɔn moma so,
nanso obi ntumi ntɔ anaasɛ ɔntɔn, gye deɛ ɔwɔ agyiraeɛ no, anaa aboa no din, anaa ne din akonta ntwerɛeɛ nko.
Ɛha na wɔhwehwɛ nyansa. Deɛ ɔwɔ nteaseɛ mmu aboa no akonta no ntoano, na ɛyɛ onipa akonta ntoano, na n’akonta ntoano yɛ ahansia aduosia nsia.
Na mehunui, na hwɛ, Adwammaa no gyina Sion bepɔ so, na mpem ɔha aduanan nnan a wɔatwerɛtwerɛ ne din ne n’Agya din wɔ wɔn moma soɔ no ka ne ho.
Na metee nne bi firi soro te sɛ nsuo bebree nne, ne aprannaa kɛseɛ nne. Na ɛnne a meteeɛ no te sɛ sankubɔfoɔ a wɔrebɔ wɔn asankuo.
Na wɔtoo dwom foforɔ bi, ahennwa ne ateasefoɔ baanan ne mpanimfoɔ no anim, na obiara antumi ansua dwom no, gye mpem ɔha aduanan nnan a wɔagye wɔn afiri asase soɔ no nko.

Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔamfa mmaa angu wɔn ho fi, na wɔyɛ mmabunu, wɔn na wɔdi Adwammaa no akyire baabiara a ɔkorɔ. Yeinom na wɔagye wɔn nkwa afiri nnipa mu ayɛ wɔn aba a ɔdi kan ama Onyankopɔn ne Adwammaa no,
na wɔanhunu atorɔ bi wɔ wɔn anomu; na wɔnni dɛm.
Na mehunuu ɔbɔfoɔ foforɔ a ɔtu nam soro mfimfini a ɔkura daa asɛmpa bi rekɔka akyerɛ wɔn a wɔte asase soɔ, ne aman ne mmusuakuo ne kasa ne nkurɔfoɔ nyinaa,
na ɔde nne kɛseɛ teaa mu sɛ: Monsuro Onyankopɔn na monhyɛ no animuonyam, ɛfiri sɛ n’atemmuo dɔn adu. Na monkoto deɛ ɔyɛɛ ɔsoro ne asase ne ɛpo ne asutire no.
Na ɔbɔfoɔ foforɔ a ɔtɔ so mmienu dii akyire kaa sɛ: Babel kɛseɛ no ahwe ase, ahwe ase, ɛfiri sɛ wama amanaman nyinaa anom n’adwamammɔ abufuo nsa no bi.
Na ɔbɔfoɔ foforɔ a ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa dii wɔn akyiri de nne kɛseɛ teaa mu sɛ: Sɛ obi koto aboa no ne ne honi no, na ɔgye agyiraeɛ de si ne moma anaa ne nsa so a,
ɔno ara na ɔbɛnom Nyankopɔn abufuo nsa a wɔahwie no gyenegyene agu n’abufuo kuruwa mu no bie, na wɔayɛ no ayayadeɛ, ogya ne sɔfe mu, abɔfoɔ kronkron ne Adwammaa no anim.
Na wɔn ayayadeɛ wisie bɛforo soro daa daa, na wɔn a wɔbɛkoto aboa no ne ne honi, ne obiara a ɔbɛgye ne din agyiraeɛ no, rennya ɔhome awia ne anadwo.
Ɛha na ahotefoɔ boasetɔ wɔ, wɔn a wɔkura Nyankopɔn ahyɛdeɛ ne Yesu gyidie mu no.
Na metee ɛnne bi firii soro a ɛkaa sɛ: Twerɛ sɛ: Nhyira ne awufoɔ a wɔwu Awurade mu firi seesei rekorɔ yi. Honhom no se: Aane, wɔbɛhome afiri wɔn brɛ no mu; na wɔn nnwuma di wɔn akyi.
Na mehunui, na hwɛ, omununkum fitaa, na obi a ɔte sɛ onipa ba te mununkum no so, na ɔbɔ sika abotire na ɔkura kantankrankyi nnamnnam bi.
Na ɔbɔfoɔ foforɔ firi asɔredan no mu de nne kɛseɛ teaa mu kyerɛɛ deɛ ɔte mununkum no soɔ no sɛ: To wo kantankrankyi twitwa, ɛfiri sɛ twaberɛ adu, na asase so nnoɔma ahoa.
Na deɛ ɔte mununkum no soɔ no de ne kantankrankyi too asase so, na ɔtwitwaa asase so nnoɔma nyinaa.
Na ɔbɔfoɔ foforɔ firi soro asɔredan no mu, na ɔno nso kura kantankrankyi nnamnnam.

Na ɔbɔfoɔ foforɔ a ɔwɔ ogya so tumi firii afɔrebukyia mu de nne kɛseɛ teaa mu kyerɛɛ deɛ ɔkura kantankrankyi nnamnnam no sɛ: To wo kantankrankyi nnamnnam no twitwa asase so bobe asiasia, ɛfiri sɛ n’aba no abere.
Na ɔbɔfoɔ no de ne kantankrankyi no too asase so, na ɔtwitwaa asase so bobe aba, na ɔde kɔguu Nyankopɔn abufuo nsa-kyi-amena kɛseɛ no mu.
Na wɔtiatiaa nsa-kyi-amena no so kuro no akyi, na mogya firii nsa-kyi-amena no mu kɔduruu apɔnkɔ nnareka ho, tenee nkwansimma apem ahansia.
Na mehunuu nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ foforɔ bi a ɛso na ɛyɛ nwanwa ɔsoro: Abɔfoɔ baason a wɔkurakura ɔhaw mmusuo nson a ɛtwa toɔ a ɛno na ɛtwa Onyankopɔn abufuo no to.
Na mehunuu biribi a ɛte sɛ ahwehwɛ po a egya fra mu. Na wɔn a wɔdii aboa no, ne ne honi, ne ne din akontahyɛdeɛ ho nkonim no gyinagyina ahwehwɛ po no ano kurakura Nyankopɔn nsankuo.
Na wɔto Nyankopɔn akoa Mose dwom ne Adwammaa no dwom sɛ:

block_quote.content: Awurade Nyankopɔn, adeɛ nyinaa so tumfoɔ,
wo nnwuma yɛ akɛseɛ na ɛyɛ nwanwa.
Amanaman hene, w’akwan tene na ɛyɛ nokorɛ.
Awurade, hwan na ɔrensuro woɔ
na ɔrenhyɛ wo din animuonyam?
Ɛfiri sɛ wo nko na woyɛ kronkron,
na amanaman nyinaa bɛba
abɛkoto w’anim,
ɛfiri sɛ w’atɛn tenenee ada adi.

verse.content: Na yeinom akyiri no mehwɛe, na wɔahini adanseɛ ntomadan asɔredan no ɔsoro.
Na abɔfoɔ baason a wɔkurakura ɔhaw mmusuo nson no firi asɔredan no mu firii adi, wɔhyehyɛ nwera fitafitaa a ɛhran, na wɔde sika abɔsoɔ abobɔ wɔn mu.
Na ateasefoɔ baanan no mu baako maa abɔfoɔ baason no sika nkuruwa nson a wɔde Nyankopɔn a ɔte ase daa daa no abufuo no ahyɛ mu mama.
Na wisie a ɛfiri Nyankopɔn animuonyam ne ne tumi no mu hyɛɛ asɔredan no ma, na obiara antumi ankɔ asɔredan no mu kɔsii sɛ wɔwiee abɔfoɔ baason no ɔhaw mmusuo nson no ansa.
Na metee nne kɛseɛ bi a ɛfiri asɔredan no mu reka kyerɛ abɔfoɔ baason no sɛ: Monkɔ nkɔhwie Nyankopɔn abufuo nkuruwa nson no ngu asase so.
Na deɛ ɔdi kan no kɔe, na ɔkɔhwiee ne kuruwa no guu asase so. Na nkudaa bɔne a ɛtutuo baa nnipa a wɔwɔ aboa no agyirahyɛdeɛ ne wɔn a wɔkotoo ne honi no so.
Na deɛ ɔtɔ so mmienu no hwiee ne kuruwa no guu po mu. Na ɛdanee sɛ owufoɔ mogya, na ɛpo no mu mmoa nyinaa wuwuiɛ.
Na deɛ ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa no hwiee ne kuruwa no guu nsubɔntene ne asutire mu, na ɛdanee mogya.
Na metee sɛ nsuo so bɔfoɔ no se:

block_quote.content: Wo a wowɔ hɔ, na wowɔ hɔ dada, na woyɛ kronkron, wotene,
ɛfiri sɛ woabu atɛn saa,
na wɔahwie ahotefoɔ ne adiyifoɔ mogya agu,
na woama wɔn mogya anom,
wɔfata saa.

verse.content: Na metee sɛ ɛnne bi firi afɔrebukyia no mu a ɛse:

block_quote.content: Aane, Awurade Nyankopɔn, adeɛ nyinaa so tumfoɔ,
w’atemmuo yɛ nokorɛ ne tenenee.

verse.content: Na deɛ ɔtɔ so nnan no hwiee ne kuruwa no guu owia so. Na wɔmaa no ogya ahoɔden sɛ ɔmfa nhyehye nnipa.
Na wɔde ahuhuro kɛseɛ hyehyee nnipa, na wɔkaa Onyankopɔn a ɔwɔ ɔhaw mmusuo yi so ahoɔden no din ho abususɛm, na wɔansakyera wɔn adwene anhyɛ no animuonyam.
Na deɛ ɔtɔ so nnum no hwiee ne kuruwa no guu aboa no ahennwa so. Na n’ahennie danee sum, na yea no nti wɔkekaa wɔn tɛkyerɛma,
na wɔn yea ne wɔn nkudaa nti wɔkaa ɔsoro Nyankopɔn ho abususɛm, na wɔannu wɔn ho wɔ wɔn nnwuma mu.
Na deɛ ɔtɔ so nsia no hwiee ne kuruwa no guu asubɔnten kɛseɛ Eufrate mu, na emu nsuo wee, na wɔasiesie kwan ama ahemfo a wɔfiri owia apueeɛ nohoa.
Na mehunuu ahonhom fi mmiɛnsa a wɔte sɛ mponkyerɛne, sɛ wɔfiri ɔtweaseɛ no anomu ne aboa no anomu ne adiyifoɔ atorofoɔ no anomu.
Na wɔyɛ ahonhommɔne ahonhom a wɔyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ, na wɔfiri kɔ wiase nyinaa ahemfo nkyɛn kɔboaboa wɔn ano ma Onyankopɔn, ade nyinaa so tumfoɔ no, da kɛseɛ no mu ko no.

wj.content: (Hwɛ, mereba sɛ owifoɔ. Nhyira ne deɛ ɔwɛn na ɔhwɛ ne ntadeɛ soɔ, na wannante adagya mu, na wɔanhunu ne kwaterekwa.)

verse.content: Na ɔboaboaa wɔn ano kɔɔ baabi a wɔfrɛ hɔ Hebri kasa mu sɛ Armagedon.
Na deɛ ɔtɔ so nson no hwiee ne kuruwa no guu ahunum. Na ɛnne kɛseɛ bi firi asɔredan no mu, firi ahennwa no mu, sɛ: Wɔawie.
Na anyinam ne ɛnne ne aprannaa bae, na asasewosoɔ kɛseɛ a ɛfiri berɛ a nnipa baa asase soɔ no wɔnhunuu so asasewosoɔ kɛseɛ saa pɛn baeɛ.
Na kuro kɛseɛ no mu paee afaafa mmiɛnsa, na amanaman nkuro hwehwee ase, na wɔkaee Babel kɛseɛ no, Nyankopɔn anim, sɛ wɔbɛma no n’abufuo a emu yɛ den no nsa kuruwa.
Na nsupɔ nyinaa dwanedwanee, na wɔanhunu mmepɔ biara bio.
Na asukɔtweaa akɛseɛ a ɛte sɛ dwetikɛseboɔ firi soro guguu nnipa so, na asukɔtweaa no haw nti nnipa kaa Nyankopɔn ho abususɛm ɛfiri sɛ na ɔhaw no so kɛse.
Na abɔfoɔ baason a wɔkurakura nkuruwa nson no mu baako bae ne me bɛkasaa sɛ: Bra na menkyerɛ wo odwamamfoɔ kɛseɛ a ɔte nsuo pii no soɔ no atemmuo.
Ɔno na wiase ahemfo ne no abɔ adwaman, na n’adwamammɔ nsa no abobo wɔn a wɔtete asase soɔ no.
Na ɔde me faa honhom mu kɔɔ ɛserɛ so. Na mehunuu ɔbaa bi a ɔte aboa kɔkɔɔ a abususɛm din ahyɛ no ma, na ɔwɔ tiri nson ne mmɛn du so.
Na ɔbaa no hyɛ atadeɛ afasebire ne nkrawoɔ, na ɔde sika ne aboɔden aboɔ ne nhwene pa ahyehyɛ ne ho, na ɔkura sika kuruwa a akyiwadeɛ ne n’adwamammɔ fi ayɛ no ma.
Na wɔatwerɛ din bi ne moma so sɛ: Ahuntasɛm. Babel kɛseɛ no, asase so nnwamamfoɔ ne akyiwadeɛ na.
Na mehunuu sɛ ahotefoɔ mogya ne Yesu adansefoɔ mogya aboro ɔbaa no, na mehunuu no no, ɛyɛɛ me nwanwa kɛse.
Na ɔbɔfoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Adɛn nti na ayɛ wo nwanwa? Mɛka wo ɔbaa no ne aboa a ɔso no a ɔwɔ tire nson ne mmɛn du no ho ahuntasɛm no.

Aboa a wohunuu no no, da bi na ɔwɔ hɔ, na afei deɛ, ɔnni hɔ, na ɔbɛfiri bunu no mu aba, na wabɛsene akɔ ɔsɛeɛ mu. Na ɛbɛyɛ wɔn a wɔtete asase soɔ a wɔamfiri wiase ahyɛaseɛ antwerɛ wɔn din nkwa nwoma mu no nwanwa sɛ, wɔbɛhunu aboa no, sɛ da bi na ɔwɔ hɔ, na afei deɛ, ɔnni hɔ, nanso ɔwɔ hɔ ara.
Ɛha na adwene a nyansa wɔ mu no wɔ. Tire nson no yɛ mmepɔ nson a ɔbaa no te soɔ, na ɛyɛ ahemfo baason.
Baanum agu, ɔbaako wɔ hɔ, ɔfoforɔ no nnya mmae, na ɔba a, ɛtwa sɛ ɔtena hɔ kakraa bi.
Na aboa a da bi na ɔwɔ hɔ na afei deɛ ɔnni hɔ no, ɔno ara nso ne deɛ ɔtɔ so nwɔtwe, na ɔfiri nson no mu, na ɔkɔ ɔsɛeɛ mu.
Na mmɛn du a wohunuiɛ no ne ahemfo du a wɔnnyaa ahennie, nanso wɔne aboa no bɛnya tumi sɛ ahemfo dɔnhwere baako.
Yeinom wɔ adwene korɔ, na wɔde wɔn tumi ne wɔn ahoɔden bɛma aboa no.
Yeinom ne Adwammaa no bɛko, na Adwammaa no bɛdi wɔn so nkonim, ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ awuranom mu Awurade ne ahemfo mu Hene, — ɔno ne wɔn a wɔka ne ho a wɔafrɛ wɔn na wɔayi wɔn na wɔdi nokorɛ no.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Nsuo a wohunuiɛ a odwamamfoɔ no te soɔ no yɛ nkuro ne nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo ne aman ne kasa ahodoɔ.
Na mmɛn du a wohunuiɛ no, ne aboa no, wɔn na wɔbɛtane odwamamfoɔ no, na wɔayɛ no pasaa, na wada adagya, na wɔadi ne nam, na wɔde ogya ahye no.
Na Onyankopɔn na ɔde ahyɛ wɔn akoma mu sɛ wɔmma ne tiri mu asɛm mmra mu, na wɔnyɛ adwene korɔ, na wɔmfa wɔn ahennie mma aboa no nkɔsi sɛ Nyankopɔn nsɛm no bɛwie duro.
Na ɔbaa a wohunuu no no ne kuro kɛseɛ a ɛdi asase so ahemfo so hene no.
Na yeinom akyiri no, mehunuu ɔbɔfoɔ foforɔ sɛ ɔfiri soro resiane ba, na ɔwɔ tumi kɛseɛ, na n’animuonyam nti asase hrann.
Na ɔde nne a emu yɛ den teaa mu sɛ:

block_quote.content: Wahwe ase, Babel kɛseɛ no ahwe ase,
na adane ahonhommɔne tenaberɛ
ne ahonhom fi nyinaa atɛeɛ
ne nnomaa a wɔyɛ fi
na wɔkyiri wɔn nyinaa atɛeɛ!
Ɛfiri sɛ amanaman nyinaa anom
n’adwamammɔ abufuo nsa no bi,
na asase so ahemfo ne no abɔ adwaman,
na asase so adwadifoɔ nam ne taamudie ahoɔden so anya wɔn ho.

verse.content: Na metee nne foforɔ firii soro sɛ:

block_quote.content: Me man, momfiri ne mu,
na moanyɛ ne nneyɛɛ bɔne no bi,
na moannya ne haw no bi.
Ɛfiri sɛ ne nneyɛɛ bɔne atoatoa abɛduru soro,
na Onyankopɔn akae n’amumuyɛ.
Montua no ka, sɛdeɛ ɔtuaa mo ka,
na momfa mmɔ ho mmienu mma no, sɛdeɛ ne nnwuma teɛ.
Kuruwa a ɔfraeɛ no, momfra mmu mmɔ ho mmienu mma no.
Dodoɔ a ɔhyɛɛ ne ho animuonyam na ɔdii taamu no,
momma n’ayayadeɛ ne n’awerɛhoɔ nnɔɔso saa.
Ɛfiri sɛ ɔkaa no n’akoma mu sɛ:
Mete hɔ sɛ ɔhemmaa, na menyɛ okunafoɔ, na merenni awerɛhoɔ da.
Yei nti na ne haw bɛba da koro pɛ,
owuo ne awerɛhoɔ ne ɛkɔm,
na wɔde ogya bɛhye no,
ɛfiri sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn a ɔbu no atɛn no yɛ ɔhoɔdenfoɔ.

verse.content: Na asase so ahemfo a wɔne no abɔ adwaman na wɔadi taamu no, sɛ wɔhunu ne hyeɛ wisie a, wɔbɛsu no, na wɔabobɔ ne ho abubuo.
N’aninyanneɛ no suro nti wɔbɛgyinagyina akyiri aka sɛ:

block_quote.content: Due, due, kuro kɛseɛ
Babel, kuro a ɛyɛ den,
ɛfiri sɛ dɔnhwereɛ baako mu na w’atemmuo aba.

verse.content: Na asase so adwadifoɔ bɛsu no na wɔagyam no, ɛfiri sɛ obi ntɔ wɔn adwadeɛ bio:

Sika kɔkɔɔ, dwetɛ, aboɔden aboɔ, nhwene pa, nwera pa, ntoma afasebire, serekye ne nkrawoɔ adwadeɛ, nnua a ɛyɛ hwam nyinaa, ne asommɛn adwinneɛ nyinaa, adwinneɛ a wɔde nnua a ɛwɔ din, yaawa, dadeɛ, abohemmaa ayɛ nyinaa,
pɛprɛ, mmorɔngo, nnu hwamhwam, kurobo, hwamfufuo, nsa, ngo, esiam muhumuhu, ayuo, nyɛmmoa, nnwan, apɔnkɔ, nteaseɛnam, nnipadua ne nnipa akra.

block_quote.content: Na aduaba a wo kra kɔn dɔ no
afiri wo nkyɛn,
na nnepa ne animuonyanneɛ nyinaa
afiri wo ho ayera, na worenhunu bio koraa.

verse.content: Nnoɔma yi ho adwadifoɔ a kuro no nti wɔanya adeɛ no, bɛgyinagyina akyiri n’aninyanneɛ no suro nti, na wɔasu na wɔagyam sɛ:

block_quote.content: Due, due, kuro kɛseɛ
a ɔfira nwera pa
ne ntoma afasebire ne nkrawoɔ,
na ɔde sika
ne aboɔden aboɔ ne nhwene pa ahyehyɛ ne ho.
Ɛfiri sɛ dɔnhwereɛ baako pɛ mu na saa ahonya no ayɛ pasaa yi.
Na hyɛn akwankyerɛfoɔ nyinaa ne wɔn a wɔnam hyɛn mu kɔ baabi nyinaa, ne hyɛn mufoɔ ne dodoɔ a wɔyɛ ɛpo so adwuma gyinagyina akyiri,

verse.content: na wɔhunuu ne hyeɛ wisie no, wɔteaa mu sɛ:

block_quote.content: Kuro bɛn na ɛte sɛ kuro kɛseɛ yi?

verse.content: Na wɔde dɔteɛ guu wɔn atifi, na wɔde osu ne gyam teaa mu sɛ:

block_quote.content: Due, due, kuro kɛseɛ yi
a n’aboɔdenneɛ nti wɔn a wɔwɔ hyɛn wɔ ɛpo soɔ nyinaa
anyinya wɔn ho wɔ mu,
ɛfiri sɛ dɔnhwereɛ baako pɛ mu na wɔayɛ no pasaa.
Ɔsoro ne mo ahotefoɔ ne asomafoɔ ne adiyifoɔ,
momma mo bo ntɔ mo yam wɔ ne ho,
ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn abu no atɛn ama mo.

verse.content: Na ɔbɔfoɔ hoɔdenfoɔ bi maa ɔboɔ bi a ɛte sɛ owiyammoɔ kɛseɛ so to twenee ɛpo mu kaa sɛ:

block_quote.content: Sɛdeɛ wɔbɛto kuro kɛseɛ Babel
atwene hwii ne no,
na wɔrenhunu bio koraa.
Na wɔrente asankubɔfoɔ ne nnwontofoɔ ne mmɛnhyɛnfoɔ ne ntotorobɛntohyɛnfoɔ
nne wo mu bio,
na wɔrenhunu adwinnie bi mu dwumfoɔ biara,
wo mu bio,
na wɔrente oyuyammoɔ
biara nka wo mu bio,
na kanea hann renhyerɛn wo mu bio,
na wɔrente ayeforɔkunu ne ayeforɔ
nne wo mu bio,
ɛfiri sɛ w’adwadifoɔ yɛɛ asase so nnipa akɛseɛ,
na wɔde w’adutoɔ adaadaa amanaman nyinaa.
Na ɛno mu na wɔhunuu adiyifoɔ ne ahotefoɔ
ne wɔn a wɔaku wɔn asase soɔ no nyinaa mogya.

verse.content: Yeinom akyiri no, metee biribi a ɛte sɛ nkurɔfoɔ pii nne kɛseɛ ɔsoro sɛ:

block_quote.content: Haleluia!
Nkwagyeɛ ne animuonyam ne tumi yɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn dea;
ɛfiri sɛ n’atemmuo yɛ nokorɛ na ɛtene,
sɛ ɔbuu odwamamfoɔ kɛseɛ
a ɔde n’adwamammɔ asɛe asase no atɛn,
na ɔtɔɔ ne nkoa mogya so werɛ wɔ ne nsamu.

verse.content: Na wɔkaa bio sɛ:

block_quote.content: Haleluia!
Na ne wisie foro soro daa daa.

verse.content: Na mpanimfoɔ aduonu nnan ne ateasefoɔ baanan no koto sɔree Onyankopɔn a ɔte ahennwa no soɔ no sɛ:

block_quote.content: Amen, Haleluia!

verse.content: Na ɛnne bi firii ahennwa no mu teaa mu sɛ:

block_quote.content: Monyi yɛn Nyankopɔn ayɛ,
mo a moyɛ ne nkoa
ne mo a mosuro no nyinaa, akɛseɛ ne nketewa.

verse.content: Na metee nne bi a ɛte sɛ nkurɔfokuo kɛseɛ nne, ne nsuo bebree nne, ne aprannaa a emu yɛ den nne sɛ:

block_quote.content: Haleluia,
ɛfiri sɛ Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn,
ade nyinaa so tumfoɔ no, adi hene.
Momma yɛn ani nnye, na yɛnni ahurisie,
na yɛnhyɛ no animuonyam,
ɛfiri sɛ Adwammaa no ayeforɔhyia adu,
na ne yere asiesie ne ho.
Na wɔde nwera pa a
ɛhoa fitaa, a ɛho teɛ maa no sɛ ɔmfira.
Na nwera pa no ne ahotefoɔ tenenee.

verse.content: Na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Twerɛ: Nhyira ne wɔn a wɔahyia wɔn adwammaa no ayeforɔ aseɛ. Na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Nyankopɔn nsɛm a ɛyɛ nokorɛ nie.
Na mehwee ne nan ase mekotoo no. Na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Hwɛ, nyɛ saa, meyɛ w’awurakwaa ne wo nuanom a wɔkura Yesu adanseɛ no mu bi. Koto Onyankopɔn! Na Yesu adanseɛ ne adiyie honhom no.
Na mehunuu sɛ ɔsoro abue, na hwɛ, ɔpɔnkɔ fitaa bi nie, na deɛ ɔte ne soɔ no, wɔfrɛ no Ɔseadeɛyɛ ne Ɔnokwafoɔ, na ɔbu atɛn, na ɔtu sa wɔ tenenee mu.
Na n’ani te sɛ ogyaframa, na ahemmotire pii bobɔ ne ti; na wɔatwerɛ ne din bi a obiara nnim gye ɔno nko.
Na ɔhyɛ atadeɛ bi a wɔde abɔ mogya mu, na ne din de: Nyankopɔn Asɛm.
Na ɛdɔm a wɔwɔ soro no tete apɔnkɔ fitafitaa so di n’akyi hyehyɛ nwera pa fitaa a ɛho teɛ.
Na afena nnamnnam bi firi n’anomu a ɔde bɛbobɔ amanaman, na ɔde dadeɛ poma bɛyɛne wɔn. Na ɔno na ɔtiatia Onyankopɔn, ade nyinaa so tumfoɔ no, abufuo a ɛyɛ den no nsa-kyi-amena no soɔ.
Na ɔwɔ din bi a wɔatwerɛ n’atadeɛ ne n’asene mu sɛ: Ahene mu Hene ne awuranom mu Awurade.
Na mehunuu ɔbɔfoɔ bi a ɔgyina owia mu. Na ɔde nne kɛseɛ teaa mu ka kyerɛɛ nnomaa a wɔtu wɔ wiem nyinaa sɛ: Mommra mmɛhyia Nyankopɔn adidie kɛseɛ no ase
mmɛdi ahemfo nam, asafohene nam, atumfoɔ nam, apɔnkɔ ne wɔn a wɔtete wɔn soɔ nam, adehyeɛ ne nkoa, nketewa ne akɛseɛ nyinaa nam.
Na mehunuu aboa no ne asase so ahemfo ne wɔn dɔm sɛ wɔaboaboa wɔn ano, na wɔne deɛ ɔte pɔnkɔ fitaa no soɔ no ne ne dɔm rebɛdi ako.

Na wɔkyeree aboa no ne odiyifoɔ torofoɔ no nso a ɔyɛɛ n’anim nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ, de daadaa wɔn a wɔgyee aboa no agyiraeɛ ne wɔn a wɔkotoo ne honi no kaa ne ho. Wɔtoo wɔn baanu yi animono guu ogya tadeɛ a sɔfe dɛre mu no mu.
Na wɔde deɛ ɔte pɔnkɔ no soɔ afena a ɛfiri n’anomu no kunkumm wɔn a aka no, na nnomaa nyinaa dii wɔn nam mee.
Na mehunuu ɔbɔfoɔ bi a ɔfiri soro resiane a ɔkura ebunu no ano safoa ne nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn kɛseɛ bi.
Na ɔkyeree ɔtweaseɛ, ɔwɔ dada a ɔno ne Ɔbonsam ne Satan no, kyekyeree no mfirinhyia apem,
na ɔtoo no twenee ebunu no mu, na ɔtoo mu, na ɔsɔɔ ano na wankɔdaadaa amanaman bio kɔsi sɛ mfirinhyia apem no bɛwie duro ansa; nanso ɛno akyiri no, ɛtwa sɛ wɔgyaa no kakra.

Na mehunuu nhennwa bi, na wɔn a wɔtete soɔ no, wɔde atemmuo maa wɔn. Na mehunuu wɔn a Yesu adanseɛ ne Nyankopɔn asɛm nti wɔtwitwaa wɔn tire no akra, ne wɔn a wɔankoto aboa no anaa ne honi na wɔannye agyiraeɛ no wɔ wɔn moma ne wɔn nsa soɔ no. Na wɔnyaa nkwa bio, na wɔne Kristo dii ahene mfirinhyia apem.
(Na awufoɔ nkaeɛ no deɛ, wɔannya nkwa bio kɔsii sɛ mfirinhyia apem no twaa mu ansa.) Yei ne owusɔreɛ a ɛdi kan no.
Nhyira ne kronkron ne deɛ ɔnya kyɛfa ɔsɔreɛ a ɛdi kan no mu. Saa nkurɔfoɔ no so na owuprenu no nni tumi, na mmom wɔbɛyɛ Nyankopɔn ne Kristo asɔfoɔ, na wɔne no bɛdi ahene mfirinhyia apem.
Na sɛ mfirinhyia apem no wie duru a, wɔbɛsane Satan afiri n’afiase,
na ɔbɛfiri adi akɔdaadaa amanaman a wɔwɔ asase afanan so, Gog ne Magog, akɔboaboa wɔn ano akɔ ɔsa, wɔn na wɔn ano dɔɔso sɛ mpoano anwea.
Na wɔforo kɔgyinaa asase tɛtrɛtɛ no so, na wɔtwaa ahotefoɔ no ne kuro a wɔdɔ no no ho nsraban hyiae. Na egya firi soro guu fam bɛhyee wɔn.
Na ɔbonsam a ɔdaadaa wɔn no, wɔtoo no twenee ogya ne sɔfe tadeɛ no mu, deɛ aboa no ne odiyifoɔ torofoɔ no wɔ, na wɔbɛyɛ wɔn ayayadeɛ awia ne anadwo daa daa.
Na mehunuu ahennwa fitaa kokuroo ne deɛ ɔte soɔ a asase ne ɔsoro dwane firii n’anim; na wɔannya baabi amma wɔn.

Na mehunuu awufoɔ, nketewa ne akɛseɛ, sɛ wɔgyinagyina ahennwa no anim; na wɔbuebuee nwoma mu. Na wɔbuee nwoma foforɔ bi a ɛyɛ nkwa nwoma no mu; na wɔnam nsɛm a wɔatwerɛ no nwoma no mu no so bubuu awufoɔ atɛn sɛdeɛ wɔn nnwuma teɛ.
Na ɛpo yii n’awufoɔ a ɛwɔ mu no mae, na Owuo ne Asamando yii awufoɔ a ɛwɔ mu no nso mae, na wɔbuu wɔn mu biara atɛn sɛdeɛ wɔn nnwuma teɛ.
Na wɔtoo Owuo ne Asamando twenee ogya tadeɛ no mu. Yei ne owuprenu no.
Na obiara a wɔanhu no sɛ wɔatwerɛ ne din wɔ nkwa nwoma no mu no, wɔtoo no twenee ogya tadeɛ no mu.
Na mehunuu ɔsoro foforɔ ne asase foforɔ, na kane soro ne kane asase no atwam, na ɛpo nni hɔ bio.
Na mehunuu kuro kronkron no, Yerusalem foforɔ, sɛ ɛfiri soro Nyankopɔn nkyɛn resiane, na wɔasiesie no sɛ ayeforɔ a wɔahyehyɛ no ama ne kunu.
Na metee nne kɛseɛ bi firi ahennwa no mu a ɛse:

block_quote.content: Hwɛ, Nyankopɔn ntomadan wɔ nnipa mu,
na ɔbɛtena mu wɔ wɔn mu,
na wɔayɛ ne man,
na Onyankopɔn no ara ne wɔn bɛtena.
Na ɔbɛpepa wɔn ani ase nisuo nyinaa.
Na owuo nni hɔ bio,
na awerɛhoɔ ne osu ne yea biara nni hɔ bio,
ɛfiri sɛ kane nnoɔma no atwam.

verse.content: Na deɛ ɔte ahennwa no soɔ no se: Hwɛ, meyɛ nnoɔma nyinaa foforɔ. Na ɔse: Twerɛ, ɛfiri sɛ nsɛm yi wɔ mu na ɛyɛ nokorɛ.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Wɔawie! Mene Alfa ne Omega, mfitiaseɛ ne awieeɛ no. Me na mede nkwa asutire mu nsuo bɛkyɛ obiara a sukɔm de no kwa.
Deɛ ɔdi nkonim no bɛnya yeinom adi, na mɛyɛ no ne Nyankopɔn na ɔno nso ayɛ me ɔba.
Na ahufoɔ ne wɔn a wɔnnye nnie ne akyiwadeyɛfoɔ ne awudifoɔ ne nnwamammɔfoɔ ne adutofoɔ ne abosonsomfoɔ ne atorofoɔ nyinaa bɛnya wɔn kyɛfa wɔ ɔtadeɛ a egya ne sɔfe dɛre mu no mu, ɛno ne owuprenu no.
Na abɔfoɔ baason a wɔkurakura nkuruwa nson no a ɔhaw mmusuo nson a ɛdi akyire no ahyehyɛ mu mama no mu baako baa me nkyɛn, ne me bɛkasaa sɛ: Bra na menkyerɛ wo ayeforɔ, Adwammaa no yere no.
Na ɔde me nam honhom mu kɔɔ bepɔ kɛseɛ tentene bi so, na ɔkyerɛɛ me kuro kronkron Yerusalem no sɛ ɛfiri soro Nyankopɔn nkyɛn resiane.
Ɛkura Nyankopɔn animuonyam. Deɛ ɛmaa no hann no te sɛ ɔboɔ a ne boɔ yɛ den papa, te sɛ ahwehwɛboɔ a emu teɛ sɛ ahwehwɛ.
Na ɛwɔ ɔfasuo kɛseɛ tentene, a ɛwɔ aponkɛseɛ dummienu, na abɔfoɔ dummienu tete apono no ano. Apono no so na wɔatwerɛ din a ɛyɛ Israel mma mmusuakuo dummienu no din.
Apono mmiɛnsa wɔ apueeɛ, apono mmiɛnsa wɔ atifi, apono mmiɛnsa wɔ anafoɔ, na apono mmiɛnsa wɔ atɔeɛ.
Na kuro no fasuo wɔ afapem dummienu a Adwammaa no asomafoɔ dummienu no din wowɔ soɔ.
Na deɛ ɔne me rekasa no kura sika susudua sɛ ɔde rebɛsusu kuro no ne n’apono ne ne fasuo no.
Na kuro no da ahinanan, na ne ntwemu ne ne trɛ yɛ pɛ. Na ɔde susudua no susuu kuro no akwansin mpem dunum. Ne ntwemu ne ne trɛ ne ne korɔn yɛ pɛ.
Na ɔsusuu ne fasuo no basafa ɔha aduanan nnan a ɛyɛ onipa nsusuiɛ sɛdeɛ ɔbɔfoɔ deɛ no teɛ.
Na deɛ wɔde too ne fasuo no yɛ ahwehwɛboɔ, na kuro no yɛ sika kronkron te sɛ ahwehwɛ kronkron.
Na wɔde aboɔden aboɔ nyinaa ahyehyɛ kuro no fasuo no fapem. Fapem a ɛdi kan yɛ ahwehwɛboɔ, deɛ ɛtɔ so mmienu yɛ hoaboɔ, deɛ ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa yɛ omununkumboɔ, deɛ ɛtɔ so nnan yɛ ahahammonoboɔ,

deɛ ɛtɔ so nnum yɛ ɛtɔnboɔ, deɛ ɛtɔ so nsia yɛ bogyanamboɔ, deɛ ɛtɔ so nson yɛ sikabereɛboɔ, deɛ ɛtɔ so nwɔtwe yɛ apopobibireboɔ, deɛ ɛtɔ so nkron yɛ akrateboɔ, deɛ ɛtɔ so du yɛ dɛnkyɛmmoɔ, deɛ ɛtɔ so dubaako yɛ owisiboɔ, deɛ ɛtɔ so dummienu yɛ beredumboɔ.
Na apono dummienu no yɛ nhwene pa dummienu. Apono no mu biara wɔde ahwene pa baako na ɛyɛeɛ. Na kuro no abɔntene yɛ sika kronkron a ɛte sɛ ahwehwɛ a emu teɛ.
Na manhunu asɔredan biara wɔ mu; na Awurade Nyankopɔn, adeɛ nyinaa so tumfoɔ, ne Adwammaa no ne n’asɔredan.
Na ɛnhia sɛ owia anaa ɔsrane bɛpae wɔ kuro no mu, ɛfiri sɛ Nyankopɔn animuonyam hyerɛn wɔ mu, na ne kanea ne Adwammaa no.
Na amanaman bɛnante ne hann no mu. Na asase so ahemfo de wɔn animuonyam bɛba mu.
Na wɔrentoto n’apono mu awia, na anadwo nni hɔ bio.
Na wɔde amanaman no animuonyam ne anidie bɛba mu.
Na ade-hunu biara ne deɛ ɔyɛ akyiwadeɛ na ɔdi atorɔ renhyɛne mu koraa, gye wɔn a wɔatwerɛ wɔn din ahyɛ Adwammaa no nkwa nwoma no mu no nko.
Na ɔkyerɛɛ me nkwa nsuo asubɔnten a ani teɛ sɛ ahwehwɛ a ɛfiri Nyankopɔn ne Adwammaa no ahennwa no mu
ne kuro no abɔntene mfimfini. Asubɔntene no afanu nyinaa na nkwa dua a ɛso aba ahodoɔ dummienu sisie, na ɛsoso n’aba bosome biara. Na dua no ahahan na wɔde sa amanaman no yadeɛ.
Na mmusuo biara nni hɔ bio; na Onyankopɔn ne Adwammaa no ahennwa no na ɛbɛsi mu, na ne nkoa bɛsom no,
na wɔbɛhunu n’anim, na ne din bɛba wɔn moma so.
Na anadwo nni hɔ, na kanea anaa owia hann nhia wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn bɛhyerɛn wɔn so. Na wɔbɛdi ahene daa daa.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Nsɛm yi wɔ mu, na ɛyɛ nokorɛ, na Awurade, adiyifoɔ ahonhom Nyankopɔn no, asoma ne bɔfoɔ sɛ ɔmmɛkyerɛ ne nkoa adeɛ a ɛtwa sɛ ɛba ntɛm.

wj.content: Na hwɛ, mereba ntɛm. Nhyira ne deɛ ɔkura nwoma yi mu adiyisɛm mu.

verse.content: Na me, Yohane, ne deɛ ɔhunuu nnoɔma yi na ɔteeɛ. Na meteeɛ na mehunuiɛ no, mehwee ase sɛ merekoto asɔre ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔkyerɛɛ me nnoɔma yi nan ase.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Hwɛ, nyɛ saa, meyɛ wo ne wo nuanom adiyifoɔ, ne wɔn a wɔkura nwoma yi mu nsɛm mu no awurakwaa. Koto sɔre Onyankopɔn!
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Nsɔ nwoma yi mu adiyisɛm ano, na ɛberɛ no abɛn.
Deɛ ɔntene no nntene ara, na deɛ ɔyɛ fi no nyɛ fi ara. Na deɛ ɔtene no ntene ara, na deɛ ɔyɛ kronkron no nyɛ kronkron ara.

wj.content: Hwɛ, mereba ntɛm, na mekura m’akatua sɛ mede merebɛma obiara sɛdeɛ n’adwuma teɛ.
Mene Alfa ne Omega, ɔkannifoɔ ne okyidifoɔ, mfitiaseɛ ne awieeɛ no.

verse.content: Nhyira ne wɔn a wɔhoro wɔn ntadeɛ, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛnya nkwa dua no ho kwan, na wɔafa apono no ano akɔ kuro no mu.
Na kuro no akyiri na akraman ne adutofoɔ ne nnwamammɔfoɔ ne awudifoɔ ne abosonsomfoɔ ne wɔn a wɔpɛ atorɔ na wɔdie nyinaa wɔ.

wj.content: Me, Yesu, na masoma me bɔfoɔ sɛ ɔmmɛdi mo nnoɔma yi ho adanseɛ asafo no mu. Mene Dawid nhini ne n’aseni, adekyeeɛ nsoromma a ɛhran no.

block_quote.content: Na honhom no ne ayeforɔ no se: Bra!
Na deɛ ɔtie no nka sɛ: Bra!
Na deɛ sukɔm de no mmra,
na deɛ ɔpɛ no mmɛgye nkwa nsuo no kwa.

verse.content: Mebɔ obiara a ɔte nwoma yi mu adiyie nsɛm no kɔkɔ sɛ: Sɛ obi de biribi ka nnoɔma yi ho a, Onyankopɔn de ɔhaw ahodoɔ a wɔatwerɛ wɔ nwoma yi mu no bɛka no ho.
Na sɛ obi yi adiyie nwoma yi mu nsɛm bi a, Onyankopɔn bɛyi ne kyɛfa afiri nkwa dua ne kuro kronkron a wɔatwerɛ ho nsɛm nwoma yi mu no mu.
Deɛ ɔdi nnoɔma yi ho adanseɛ no se:

wj.content: Aane, mereba ntɛm.

verse.content: Amen. Awurade Yesu, bra!
Yɛn Awurade Yesu adom nka mo nyinaa. [Amen.]
